Translations.Text: uli jung-e hananimkke gwiuiha neun ja issgo italhaneun ja issnani gwiuihaneun ja nugudeun olbaleun gil-eul chuguhanola
geuleona baleun gil-eseo italha neun ja geudeul-eun buljiog-ui yeonlyoga doe nila
hananim-ui malsseum-i iss-eo man-il geudeul-i baleun gil-eul geodneundamyeon naega geu deul wie pungseonghan bileul naelyeo julila
hananim-eun geuleohge hayeo geudeul-eul siheomhayeossnani junim-ui galeuchim-eul oe myeonhaneun ja issdamyeon geubun-eun geuleul go tongseuleoun eungbeolsog-e deulge halila
sawon-eun hananim-ui geos-igeoneulha nanimgwa eotteon geosdo biyuhaji malla
hananim-ui jong-i il-eona geubunkke gyeongbaehani geudeul-i tteleuljieo geu leul dulleo ssadeola
illeogalodoe sillo naneun junim man-eul gyeongbaehamyeo geubun-ege eotteon geos do biyuhaji anihanola
illeogalodoe seuseulo-ege haeag-eul kkichineun neohuileul baleungillo indo haneun geos-eun naui neunglyeog-i anila
illeogalodoe hananim-e daehanghayeo naleul bohohayeo jul eoneu nugudo-eobs-euni naneun geubun oee eotteon gos-eseodo ansigcheoleul guhal su eobsnola
sillo naneun hananim-ui gyesiwa mesejileul jeonhaneun geos ppun-eulo hana nimgwa geubun-ui seonjijaleul geoyeoghaneun ja boljiog-e deul-eoga geugos-eseo yeong juhalila
geudeul-eun yagsogbad-eun geos-eul boge doelini geuttae geudeul-eun nuga deo yaghanjaimyeo eoneu jjog-i yeolseingaleul al ge doelila
illeogalodoe neohuiga yagsogbad-eun eungbeol-i gakkai wassneunji animyeon ju nimkkeseo iljeong-gigan dong-an yuyehasyeossneun ji alji moshanola
hananimman-i boiji anhneun geos eul al ppun-eulo geubun-eun eoneu nugue gedo geubun-ui sinbileul allyeo juji anh eusinila
geuleona geubun-i seontaeghan seonji janeun je-oelo geubun-eun han muliui su hojadeullo hayeogeum geuui apdwileul haeng jinke hasinila

hananim-eun geudeul-i junim-ui me sejileul jeondalhayeossneunji algoja hasim imyeo ttohan geubun-eun geudeulgwa hamkke iss neun modeun sinbideul-eul ewossago gyesi myeo modeun geos-eul susjalo giloghasinila
